name: Junko Rewound
description:
Play as an old war robot model named Junko to swing, climb, walk, jump, and overcharge enemies with your master key!

WASD movement

left click to attack

shift to thrust

right click to overcharge

Use the attack button to proceed through menus!

This game has controller support, and a latin american translation.  The LATAM translation is a bit odd right now and the font has a few issues, but it'll be updated in a post jam version of the game!

Let me know what you guys think!
